description: Number of "magic squares" of order n (see comment line for exact definition).
comments: This is the number of n X n square arrays with nonnegative integer entries in which every row and column add to 2 (A000681) normalized by dividing by n!/2^[n/2].
references: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 125, #25, A_n.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
